name: Frog Jumpers
description:
Frog Jumpers is a pixel adventure 2d like game. The game is in early access, and this is only the beta for this game. The FULL game will release 12/24 or 12/25 with the following gameplay

1. lobby

2. Map editor

3. 7 more levels

4.player customization

5. bug fixes

6. MILK

7. Secrets

8.Dani

and more. Enjoy the game for now until the following days.

Have fun
